title: Interest rates up, will home prices follow?
contentencoded:
In a few weeks, the accounting quarter ends and then the emails and envelopes start arriving with results. For those with bonds, it might not be pretty.

John Silvia, chief economist at Wells Fargo, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss interest rates, bonds, and the housing market.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, June 12, 2013
